properties.name: application.key.sdjwt.pkcs11-config
properties.description: Location of the config file, see the official java documentation

properties.name: application.key.sdjwt.private-key
properties.description: Private Key, if the key is not managed by HSM This includes vault or just mounted as environment variable

properties.name: application.key.sdjwt.verification-method
properties.description: The id of the verification method in the did document with which a verifier can check the issued VC In did tdw/webvc this is the full did#fragment

properties.name: application.key.sdjwt.version
properties.description: The version of the sd-jwt schema

properties.name: application.key.sdjwt.zk-signing-key
properties.description: Private Key for ZK root signing, always secp256k1

properties.name: application.template-replacement
properties.description: Replacement Values for providing replacement template values for issuer metadata & openid configuration json Key is the value to be replaced, the value is the value it will be replaced with.
